Articles.Content:
The first and last version of KSP I really played was 1.0.5. I miss the UI. I don't like playing the Unity 5 builds because of it. It feels like it wants my attention more than just being there when I need it. The loading screen bar is huge, and the fonts in it and the navball no longer feel purposeful.
Would it be possible to mod the UI to feel more like it did in Unity 4?

Edited July 15, 2018 by Synthetic

I've found setting most UI elements to 90%, leaving UI scale 100%, and setting all of the navball indicators to 110% with NavBallAdjustor gives a closer approximation of pre-1.1 UI feel. Unfortunately the navball markings and text are now blurry.

I've just realized UI opacity is no longer an option in 1.1+...

Edited July 21, 2018 by Synthetic
